summary: A video-sharing app where only the owner can upload videos for fans to watch, featuring a TikTok-style profile interface
architectural_notes: Video storage and streaming capabilities needed
TikTok-inspired UI/UX for profile and video display
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Creator profile picture placeholder with modern gradient design (profile-avatar.dim_200x200.png)
- App logo with bold, energetic styling suitable for video platform branding (app-logo.dim_300x100.png)
- Video thumbnail placeholder for empty states (video-placeholder.dim_400x600.png)

existing_features.title: Implement owner authentication using Internet Identity to restrict video uploads to a single authorized user
Build a TikTok-style profile page displaying the creator's profile information including profile picture, username, bio, and video count statistics
Create a video feed interface where fans can browse and watch uploaded videos in a scrollable grid or vertical feed layout

Design and implement a cohesive visual theme with bold, vibrant colors (avoiding blue and purple), modern typography, and smooth animations that create an engaging social media aesthetic throughout the application

new_feature_requests.summary: User authentication system for owner login
Video upload functionality restricted to owner account
Video feed/gallery for fans to browse and watch uploaded videos
Create video upload functionality that accepts video files, stores them in stable memory, and associates them with metadata (title, description, upload timestamp)
